name: Tom's Crunchy Salad
author: COLVIN
summary: A colorful and crunchy salad that you can make up in advance and eat over several days -- great for singles on the run and colorful and unusual at dinner parties.
ingredients: 2  red bell pepper, seeded and diced
2  green bell peppers, seeded and diced
½ cup Italian salad dressing, or as needed
directions: In a serving bowl, toss together the red bell pepper, green bell pepper, tomatoes, celery, bean sprouts and onion
Stir in the Italian dressing just before serving
This salad can also be stored in a resealable bag in the refrigerator until you are ready to serve it
